long_description: The women's Swany X-Therm gloves offer advanced fabric and design for dependable warmth and protection. Waterproof, breathable inserts keep hands dry. Nylon shell fabric absorbs heat from sunlight and reflects body heat back to the hand. Supple, top-grain leather palms are durable and water repellent. Polyester insulation is light and compressible. Pockets with locking, water-resistant zippers are perfect for handwarmer heat packs, sold separately. The Swany X-Therm gloves feature fingers that are anatomically curved for a natural, comfortable fit. Gauntlets with fleece storm cuffs and quick-release straps keep the gloves in place and seal debris out.
short_description: The women's Swany X-Therm gloves offer advanced fabric and design for dependable warmth and protection.
